pr_title: Refactor the creation of instrument batchers to be in a central location

timeline.message:
Refactor the creation of instrument batchers to be in a central location.
This should allow us to build a Views API into the SDK.

timeline.bodyText: Were these ones left empty on purpose?
timeline.author: carlosalberto

replies.bodyText: nope! I'll fix that before merging.
replies.author: jkwatson

timeline.message: move the ViewRegistry up one package, and clean up the visibility of other classes
